QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.send_for_payment as send_for_payment, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.code as code, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.description as description, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.generate_line_items as generate_line_items, 'clr_vendor_contracts' as odf_obj_type, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.finish_date as finish_date, ( SELECT P.PAGE_CODE FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = ODF_CA_CLR_VENDOR_CONTRACTS.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'clr_vendor_contracts' ) ) as page_layout, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.contact as contact, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.start_date as start_date, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.owner as owner, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.not_to_exceed as not_to_exceed, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.amount as amount, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.transaction_type as transaction_type, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.created_by) as created_by, CASE WHEN (odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.amount*1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE (odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.spent_to_date*1)*100/(odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.amount*1) END as pct_spent, ((odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.amount*1)-(odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.spent_to_date*1)) as remaining, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.ODF_BLUEPRINT_ID as odf_blueprint_id, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.contract_type as contract_type, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.spent_to_date as spent_to_date, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.name as name, NVL( odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_blueprint_id, (select id from odf_blueprints b where b.type = NLS_UPPER('clr_vendor_contracts') and b.is_default = 1 ) ) as odf_blp_active_id, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.status as status from odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts where 1 = 1
